title: Beyond Stupid: Mega Morons
description: This week, the gals bring you a special extra bonus episode with tales of super stupid people trying (and failing) to pull off super stupid stunts. Topics include toilet paper hoarders, a misguided Molotov cocktail, a guy who accidentally robbed the wrong bank, and a social media kingpin with a "chip" on his shoulder. Break open *literally anything* you have in your liquor cabinet, double check your deposit slip, and tune in for Beyond Stupid: Mega Morons. For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
